entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Cartwright
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:39 a.m. ADT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 2.
